mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_info_tbl (user_name, nick_name, pass_word, tel_phone, e_mail, id_card) VALUES (#{userName}, #{nickName}, PASSWORD(#{passWord}), #{telPhone}, #{eMail}, #{idCard})

INSERT INTO user_info_his_tbl (user_name, nick_name, pass_word, user_type, tel_phone, e_mail, id_card, created_date, updated_date) SELECT user_name, nick_name, pass_word, user_type, tel_phone, e_mail, id_card, created_date, updated_date FROM user_info_tbl WHERE user_name = #{userName}
